value.string:
"""
 Client & vendors accounts.
 
 """
 
 from Products.ERP5Form.Report import ReportSection
 
 request = context.REQUEST
 to_date = request['to_date']
 transaction_section_category = request['transaction_section_category']
 transaction_simulation_state = request['transaction_simulation_state']
 role_filter_list = request.get('entity_role', None)
 omit_balanced_accounts = request['omit_balanced_accounts']
 omit_empty_accounts = request['omit_empty_accounts']
 from_date = request.get('from_date', None)
 accounting_transaction_line_currency = request.get('accounting_transaction_line_currency', None)
 
 # role_filter_list == None means no filter on the role
 if role_filter_list == [''] : 
 role_filter_list = None
 
 result = []
 
 params = { 
 'to_date' : to_date,
 'transaction_section_category' : transaction_section_category,
 'section_category' : transaction_section_category,
 'simulation_state' : transaction_simulation_state,
 'accounting_transaction_line_currency' : None,
 'report_depth' : 5,
 }
 
 params['hide_grouping'] = request['omit_grouped_references']
 if from_date: 
 params['from_date'] = from_date
 
 portal = context.portal_url.getPortalObject()
 
 entity_columns = [
 ('getStopDate', 'Date'),
 ('Entity_getParentPortalType', 'Type'),
 ('Entity_getSourceGapId', 'GAP'),
 ('Entity_getReference', 'Invoice No'), 
 ('Entity_getParentTitle', 'Title'), 
 ('Entity_getSourceReference', 'Reference'),
 ('simulation_state', 'State'),
 ('source_debit', 'Debit'),
 ('source_credit', 'Credit'),
 ('source_balance', 'Balance'),
 ]
 if not params['hide_grouping'] :
 entity_columns.append(('grouping_reference', 'Grouping Reference'))
 
 # to be able to use Entity_statBalance, Entity_zGetAccountingTransactionList, we must edit accounting_selection
 # FIXME: instead we should use getInvetory and portal_catalog
 saved_params = context.portal_selections.getSelectionParams("accounting_selection")
 context.portal_selections.setSelectionParamsFor("accounting_selection", params)
 
 for party in context.Account_zDistinctSectionList():
 o = party.getObject() 
 if role_filter_list and hasattr(o, 'getRole') and o.getRole() not in role_filter_list : 
 continue
 if hasattr(o, 'getGroup') and o.getGroup() : 
 group = 'group/%s'%o.getGroup()
 else : 
 group = ""
 if group != transaction_section_category : # don't show entities belonging to the group we are reporting
 if omit_empty_accounts and (len(o.Entity_zGetAccountingTransactionList(**params)) == 0) :
 pass
 elif omit_balanced_accounts and (int(o.Entity_statBalance(**params)) == 0) :
 pass
 else : 
 if hasattr(o, 'getRole') and o.getRole() : 
 title = '%s (%s)'%(o.getTitle(), o.getRole())
 else : 
 title = o.getTitle()
 result.append(
 ReportSection(title=title,
 level=2,
 path=o.getPhysicalPath(), 
 form_id='Entity_viewAccountingTransactionList',
 ## XXX Here we must use accounting_selection, because stat scripts read this selection 
 selection_name = 'accounting_selection',
 selection_params = params,
 selection_columns = entity_columns,
 selection_sort_order=[('delivery.stop_date', 'ascending')], ) )
 
 context.portal_selections.setSelectionParamsFor("accounting_selection", saved_params)
 return result
